a-table/bordered.description: Whether to show all table borders

a-table/childrenColumnName.description: The column contains children to display

a-table/dataSource.description: Data record array to be displayed

a-table/expandedRowRender.description: Expanded container render for each row

a-table/expandRowByClick.description: Whether to expand row by clicking anywhere in the whole row

a-table/indentSize.description: Indent size in pixels of tree data

a-table/locale.description: i18n text including filter, sort, empty text, etc

a-table/pagination.description: Pagination config or [Pagination] (/ant-design-vue/components/pagination/), hide it by setting it to false

a-table/rowKey.description: Row's unique key, could be a string or function that returns a string

a-table/scroll.description: Set horizontal or vertical scrolling, can also be used to specify the width and height of the scroll area. It is recommended to set a number for x, if you want to set it to true, you need to add style .ant-table td { white-space: nowrap; }.

a-table/customHeaderRow.description: Set props on per header row
